description: This advanced video module covers the essentials of creating a compelling CV.

generated_text:
**Module 28: CV**
**Duration: 11 minutes**
This advanced video module covers the essentials of creating a compelling CV. Learners will discover how to tailor their CV to specific job openings, highlight relevant skills and experience, and use keywords to pass applicant tracking systems. Practical tips and examples will be provided to help learners enhance their CV and increase their chances of landing an interview. By the end of this module, learners will be able to create a strong, effective CV that showcases their expertise and achieves their career goals.
